package-manager.title: PCRE Perl regex Library
package-manager.description: The PCRE library is a set of functions that implement regular expression pattern matching using the same syntax and semantics as Perl, with just a few differences. The current implementation of PCRE (release 4.x) corresponds approximately with Perl 5.8, including support for UTF-8 encoded strings. However, this support has to be explicitly enabled; it is not the default.
